recommendations.recommendation:
That was definitely a very enjoyable watch. Story kind of/short of picks up where the second season left us and even though its cannon it gives the feeling of a side story with some very good laughs, awesome animation and the gang you love to see going through their usual shenanigans.
Recommended! P.S CAN"T WAIT for proper S3 !!!

anime.description: A video game-loving shut-in, http://anidb.net/ch78020 [Satou Kazuma]`s life should`ve ended when he was hit by a truck, but through a twist of fate, he ends up reincarnating in another world--and dragging the troublemaking goddess, http://anidb.net/ch78019 [Aqua], the wildly dorky mage, http://anidb.net/ch78018 [Megumin], and the unrelentingly delusional lady knight, http://anidb.net/ch78021 [Darkness], with him. Now, the Crimson Demon village that Megumin and http://anidb.net/ch81003 [Yun`yun] are from is facing a threat that could mean its ending. Kazuma and his gang follow Yun`yun, who returns to the Crimson Demon village intent on saving it... when they are faced with their greatest threat yet! What will become of the unremarkable adventurer Kazuma`s life in another world?! Source: crunchyroll

character.name: Satou Kazuma
character.description: Satou Kazuma is a game-obsessed shut-in Japanese teenager. He is sent to the parallel reality after dying from acute stress reaction, forcing http://anidb.net/ch78019 [Aqua] to come with him after she irritates him with her attitude. On becoming an adventurer, Kazuma joins the Adventurer class, which, despite being ranked the lowest, allows him to learn various skills from other classes, albeit at an increased cost. With his ability, Kazuma learns basic skills such as stealing, archery, monster detection, and basic magic.

character.name: Yun`yun
character.description: Yun`yun is http://anidb.net/ch78018 [Megumin]`s former classmate and the crimson demon clan`s chief`s daughter. She`s a highly skilled archwizard whose lack of adherence to a crimson demon village custom causes her to be estranged from her peers. Yun`yun uses her lifelong rivalry with Megumin as an excuse to forge a friendship with her. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Vanir
character.description: Vanir is a Duke of Hell and one of the generals in the army of the Devil King. His appearance suggests that he wears a mask, but in truth the mask is his real body. He possesses clairvoyance and is able to read into anyone who isn`t about as or more powerful, or extremely cunning. He uses this ability to goad people into deep frustration, thereby proceeding to prey on their negative emotions, which he greatly enjoys.
